## TextAreaBuilderOptions.width property

Width constraint for the textarea.

**Signature:**

```typescript
width?: number;
```

## Remarks

When set to 0 or not specified, the textarea has no width constraint and grows with content. When set to a positive value, lines longer than the width will wrap to the next line.
